name: base3d.js
description: Comfortable APIs for web based parsing and editing of building data in BASE format.

scripts.dist: npm run build && uglifyjs build/base3d.js -o dist/base3d.min.js -cm --source-map includeSources,content=build/base3d.js.map,url=base3d.min.js.map
scripts.dist-gzip: npm run build && uglifyjs build/base3d.js -o dist/base3d.min.js -cm --source-map includeSources,content=build/base3d.js.map,url=base3d.min.js.map && gzip -9 dist/base3d.min.js dist/base3d.min.js.map && mv dist/base3d.min.js.gz dist/base3d.min.js && mv dist/base3d.min.js.map.gz dist/base3d.min.js.map
